snippet.title: London's Heathrow Airport unveils new-look Terminal 2
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Stop dressing so tacky for church
snippet.description:

snippet.title: In celebration of 4/20, weed and a tale of two cities
snippet.description:
* Through a bit of calendrical coincidence, Easter Sunday this year falls on April 20. That's unfortunate because April 20 has become, through no fault of its own, the highest and holiest day of the pot smoker's year.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/19/opinion/barcott-pot-smoking-4-20/index.html
